H0.text: What is the acronym referring to a scale of readiness in the US military, derived from 'defense readiness condition'. DRC

H1.text: What is the acronym referring to a scale of readiness in the US military, derived from 'defense readiness condition'. DRCS

H2.text: What is the acronym referring to a scale of readiness in the US military, derived from 'defense readiness condition'. DRCO

H3.text: What is the acronym referring to a scale of readiness in the US military, derived from 'defense readiness condition'. DefCon

A4.text: The defense readiness condition (DEFCON) is an alert state used by the United States Armed Forces.

A5.text: DEFCON 1 signals impending outbreak of nuclear warfare.
